com.gsma.mobileconnect.cache

Interface IDiscoveryCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscoveryCacheHashMapImpl

    public interface IDiscoveryCache
    Interface to the discovery response cache.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(DiscoveryCacheKey key, DiscoveryCacheValue value)
      Add a value to the cache with the specified key.
      void clear()
      Empty the cache.
      DiscoveryCacheValue get(DiscoveryCacheKey key)
      Return a cached value as determined by the key.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Is the cache empty?
      void remove(DiscoveryCacheKey key)
      Remove any entry from the cache that matches the key.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(DiscoveryCacheKey key,
       DiscoveryCacheValue value)
        Add a value to the cache with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key. (Required).
        value - The value to be cached. (Required).

      • get

        DiscoveryCacheValue get(DiscoveryCacheKey key)
        Return a cached value as determined by the key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the data to return. (Required).
        Returns:
        The cached value if present, null otherwise.

      • remove

        void remove(DiscoveryCacheKey key)
        Remove any entry from the cache that matches the key.
        Parameters:
        key - The data to be removed. (Required).

      • clear

        void clear()
        Empty the cache.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Is the cache empty?
        Returns:
        True if the cache is empty, false otherwise.
